Package adobe.WebServer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DELETEBasic
    Checks if Delete works or not Creates a test file in the server's directory and tests if the file was deleted successfully
    GETBasic  
    GracefulExitHook
    When the sig-int signal is given this class runs and terminates all the server objects created on this jvm
    HEADBasic  
    Main
    Starts the server with the given config file present in the conf/ directory
    POSTBasic  
    Server
    Server class initializes the different aspects to start a server such as home path, thread pool information and keep alive time
    ServerEngine
